item.title: Dan Bongino officially leaves FBI deputy director role after less than a year, returns to 'civilian life'
item.description: Dan Bongino returned to private life on Sunday, stepping down from his FBI deputy director role after less than a year on the job.

item.title: Kamala Harris blasts Trump administration’s capture of Venezuela’s Maduro as ‘unlawful and unwise’
item.description: Kamala Harris condemns Trump's capture of Venezuelan dictator Maduro as "unlawful and unwise," warning of potential chaos and questioning oil motives.

item.title: Mamdani strongly condemns Trump's capture of Venezuelan leader Maduro as 'act of war'
item.description: NYC Mayor Zohran Mamdani slammed President Donald Trump's capture of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro as an "act of war" and vowed to protect New York...

item.title: Trump reveals Venezuela’s Maduro was captured in ‘fortress’-like house: ‘He got bum rushed so fast’
